statements: SELECT driver_id, music_genre, playlist_name, volume_level, display_color FROM driver_preferences;
SELECT playlist_name, driver_id, display_color, volume_level, music_genre FROM driver_preferences;
SELECT * FROM driver_preferences WHERE driver_id = 1;
SELECT music_genre, playlist_name FROM driver_preferences WHERE display_color = 'blue';
SELECT driver_id, volume_level FROM driver_preferences WHERE music_genre = 'Rock';
SELECT driver_id, music_genre, playlist_name, volume_level, display_color FROM driver_preferences;
SELECT * FROM driver_preferences WHERE volume_level > 50;
SELECT driver_id, playlist_name FROM driver_preferences WHERE music_genre = 'Pop';
SELECT * FROM driver_preferences ORDER BY display_color ASC, volume_level DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_drivers FROM driver_preferences;
SELECT * FROM driver_preferences;
SELECT driver_id, music_genre FROM driver_preferences WHERE playlist_id = 1;
SELECT playlist_name, playlist_duration FROM playlist WHERE playlist_id = 3;
SELECT driver_id, music_genre, playlist_name FROM driver_preferences JOIN playlist ON driver_preferences.playlist_id = playlist.playlist_id;
SELECT * FROM driver_preferences ORDER BY music_genre DESC, driver_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM driver_preferences WHERE driver_id = 1;
SELECT playlist_id, playlist_name FROM playlist WHERE playlist_duration > 60;
SELECT playlist_name FROM playlist ORDER BY playlist_duration DESC;
SELECT driver_id, music_genre, playlist_name FROM driver_preferences JOIN playlist ON driver_preferences.playlist_id = playlist.playlist_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_drivers FROM driver_preferences;
SELECT * FROM driver_preferences;
SELECT driver_id, music_preference, volume_level FROM driver_preferences;
SELECT podcast_title, podcast_host, category FROM podcast_library WHERE episode_duration > 30;
SELECT song_name, artist_name, genre FROM music_library WHERE release_year < 2000;
SELECT driver_id, music_preference, podcast_preference, volume_level FROM driver_preferences WHERE volume_level >= 5;
SELECT * FROM driver_preferences WHERE music_preference = 'Rock' AND volume_level > 50;
SELECT song_name, artist_name FROM music_library WHERE genre = 'Pop' ORDER BY release_year DESC;
SELECT driver_id, music_preference, podcast_preference FROM driver_preferences JOIN podcast_library ON driver_preferences.driver_id = podcast_library.podcast_id;
SELECT * FROM driver_preferences ORDER BY volume_level ASC, music_preference DESC;
SELECT podcast_title, podcast_host, episode_duration FROM podcast_library WHERE category = 'Technology' LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM drivers;
SELECT driver_name, driver_id FROM drivers WHERE driver_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM music_preferences ORDER BY volume_level DESC;
SELECT driver_id, title FROM audiobooks WHERE author = 'J.K. Rowling';
SELECT station_name, frequency FROM radio_stations WHERE driver_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM drivers;
SELECT driver_name FROM drivers WHERE driver_id = 1;
SELECT title, author, narrator FROM audiobooks WHERE title LIKE '%Mystery%';
SELECT station_name, frequency FROM radio_stations WHERE driver_id = 3 ORDER BY frequency DESC;
SELECT * FROM music_preferences WHERE volume_level > 50 ORDER BY driver_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM drivers_preferences;
SELECT driver_name, favorite_radio_station FROM drivers_preferences WHERE playlist_id = 5;
SELECT playlist_name, song_count FROM playlists ORDER BY song_count DESC;
SELECT artist_name, album_name FROM songs WHERE duration_minutes < 4.5;
SELECT * FROM radio_stations WHERE genre = 'Rock' ORDER BY station_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM drivers_preferences WHERE favorite_radio_station IS NOT NULL;
SELECT driver_name, playlist_id FROM drivers_preferences ORDER BY driver_name ASC;
SELECT song_name, artist_name, album_name, duration_minutes FROM songs WHERE duration_minutes > 5 ORDER BY duration_minutes DESC;
SELECT driver_name, car_make, car_model, car_year FROM driver_cars INNER JOIN drivers_preferences ON driver_cars.driver_id = drivers_preferences.id;
SELECT playlist_id, playlist_name, song_count FROM playlists WHERE song_count > 10 ORDER BY song_count DESC;
